November 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Get ready to embrace November's crisp, cozy vibes as we dive into a new edition of The Justia Insider! As the leaves fall and the temperatures drop, the air has an undeniable sense of anticipation. This month's newsletter has exciting updates, inspiring stories, and many opportunities for you to get involved. So, let's harness the energy of this season and make November a month of growth! Read on to stay in the loop and stay inspired.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Short Videos (Legal Content). We have recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Patients’ Rights under Mexican Law on our YouTube Channel.

Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates. We have recently updated the content of the Protection Law (Amparo), adding to the growing collection of updated laws on our portal. Additionally, we have refreshed the look and feel of both the Tax Code and the Protection Law to provide a more user-friendly experience.

Justia Elevate. We continue improving Justia Elevate with regular updates and features, including version upgrades for WordPress and the Yoast SEO plugin, support for YouTube shorts, and titles for FAQ stripes, among other improvements.

QA Automation. Our QA Automation Team has recently rolled out several updates, which encompass expanded support for visual regression coverage, QA tests for the Justia Elevate production environment, and an updated ZAP (security verification) tool for on-demand page scanning, among various other enhancements.

Data Team. Our team has recently updated our Justia Lawyer Directory analytics tracking infrastructure and fine-tuned our mailing service event processing. These improvements guarantee a seamless and uninterrupted data flow, enhancing performance and reliability.

Justia Elevate. Justia Elevate remains committed to delivering ongoing updates to our clients. Our latest enhancements include the ability to incorporate external feeds for Justia blogs into Justia Elevate properties, offering a preview of color palettes within the Justia Elevate Designs gallery, and, as always, we've implemented a wide range of additional updates and refinements.

U.S. Supreme Court Center. In anticipation of the U.S. Supreme Court term, we have introduced behind-the-scenes updates to streamline the content revision process for our Editorial Team. Furthermore, our efforts have been dedicated to enhancing performance ensuring swift loading times.

State Codes: We have meticulously processed our State Codes archive to improve crosslinking coverage across various year versions. This enhancement not only benefits our users but also strengthens our SEO efforts.

Justia Connect: We've revamped the design of our Webinars and CLE Centers, enhancing their user-friendliness and visual appeal. Furthermore, we've introduced a new Monthly CLE and Webinar Calendar to help users keep track of upcoming events.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • 50-State Surveys. We worked on surveys on compulsory education laws for the Education Law Center and the emancipation of minors for the Family Law Center, among other surveys.
  • Justia Legal Dictionary. We completed this project, producing a resource with thousands of legal and business definitions compiled with AI assistance from multiple sources.

  • Case Summaries. We committed plenty of time and effort to testing a new tool that will allow us to use AI to summarize cases more efficiently.

Justia Employee Spotlight

Diego Lopez Won 2nd Place in a Programming Contest at his University.

We hosted our latest Just Meet Up! on October 18th, focusing on open-source AI tools (from users to developers). Alonso delivered an engaging presentation that drew over 20 students and numerous other Justians who stuck around to join the presentation. The event started at 6 p.m. (Central time) and continued until 9:30 p.m. It was a fantastic evening of sharing and debating ideas; everyone was genuinely excited about it.

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember

Mexican Revolution Day
November 20th

Mexican Revolution Day, celebrated on November 20th, commemorates the 1910-1920 Mexican Revolution. This national holiday highlights the fight for justice, equality, and the overthrow of Porfirio Díaz's dictatorship. It's marked by parades, civic events, and cultural celebrations throughout Mexico, emphasizing the country's enduring spirit of change and progress.

Thanksgiving
November 23rd and 24th

Thanksgiving in the U.S. is celebrated on the fourth Thursday of November and is a cherished holiday where people come together to express gratitude for the year's blessings. It revolves around a traditional feast featuring roast turkey, stuffing, and pumpkin pie. The holiday has historical roots in the Pilgrims' harvest feast with Native Americans and is marked by parades, football games, and acts of charity. It symbolizes reflection, thankfulness, and the start of the holiday season.

DID YOU KNOW?

Just Meet Up! October’s Session

We hosted our latest Just Meet Up! on October 18th, focusing on open-source AI tools (from users to developers). Alonso delivered an engaging presentation that drew over 20 students and numerous other Justians who stuck around to join the presentation. The event started at 6 p.m. (Central time) and continued until 9:30 p.m. It was a fantastic evening of sharing and debating ideas; everyone was genuinely excited about it.

Justia Attended the "Mex-AI-Can" Legal Tech Event

Mex-AI-Can, sponsored by Justia, was an outstanding event that brought together online and in-person participants to explore the fusion of artificial intelligence and the legal field. The panelists shared their insights, sparking a vision of an AI-driven legal future and fostering a shared journey that challenged boundaries and encouraged a more efficient legal world. In Mex-AI-Can, a transformative shared experience, Legal Hackers highlighted the power of community and collaboration, challenging people to envision a more intelligent and efficient legal world.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia Ghoulie Awards 2023

Ladies and gentlemen, ghouls and goblins, on the enchanting October 31st, we gathered for the Justia Ghoulie Awards, an eagerly expected highlight in our calendar. Once again, you, our incredible participants, brought the house down with stunning costumes and spooktacular displays. Your boundless creativity and unwavering enthusiasm continue to astound us, and we can't wait to see what the future holds for this beloved Justia tradition. Congratulations to our well-deserving top vote-getters, and let the celebration of Halloween-loving hearts continue!

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Antonio González, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
